title: Royal Sentinel Armor
contents: description | Taunt (1 Charge) | Bonus action: You can taunt a target within 5 feet. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls against targets other than you until the end of your next turn.
description | Sacrifice (2 Charges) | Reaction: you can transfer (non AOE) damage to an ally within 5 feet to yourself.
text | Regain all charges after a long rest.

title: Empty vial of preserving poision
contents: text | You can store your sweat in this vial once per long rest.
text | As a bonus action, you can coat a slashing or piercing weapon or up to three pieces of ammunition with your this vial.

text | Howere, the posion is less potent in this vial. The duration is halfed 1d4/2, 1d6/2, 1d8/2, 1d10/2 rounds. Minimum 1 round. A creature affected by curare sweat can attempt a new saving throw at the end of each of its turns to end the effect.

title: Compass of Zephrah
contents: text | This compass points to the location of Zephrah (Air Ashari).

title: Orc Wrestling Champion's Belt
contents: property | Attunement | Yes. Orcs, half-orcs only
text | This belt has 3 charges. While wearing this belt, you can spend 1 charge to gain advantage on Grappling and Shoving check.
text | The belt regains 1d4 charges after a short or long rest.
